conbody.p: A module is a portion of a component page that can be shared between pages. Modules are based on a dataset and manage the display of those data.

section.title: Module loading mode
section.p: When included, modules can be loaded at runtime either as synchronized: waiting for with all modules of the page to be refreshed or de-synchronized: being the single module refreshed on the page.
The default loading mode is set to synchronized.
